questions.question: The song ……………………… on an old folk tune.
The farmer ………………………. when he bought a barren cow.
questions.description: The farmer didn't cheat. Someone cheated him. Hence, we need the passive verb form here.

questions.question: The balloon ………………………. with a bang.
questions.description: Burst is the past tense of burst.

questions.question: Good posture ………………………… from holding the backbone straight.
questions.description: Use the simple present to talk about facts.

questions.question: Abraham Lincoln …………………………. from an impoverished background.
questions.description: We use the simple past to say that something happened in the past.

questions.question: Bacteria ………………………… in the air we breathe and in the food we eat.
questions.description: Bacteria is a plural noun bacterium is the singular form.

questions.question: The actress ………………………… for her babyish temper tantrums.
Everyone …………………………….. aware of the dangers of smoking.
He said that he ………………………… for Alice.
questions.description: A past verb is used after a past reporting verb.

questions.question: He said that he ………………………… a job.
questions.description: A present perfect in the direct speech will become past perfect in the indirect speech.

questions.question: She said that she …………………………. for ages.
questions.description: A present perfect continuous in the direct speech will become past perfect continuous in the indirect speech.
